description: Let love blossom in the heart of Ubud. Curated romantic experiences for couples — from floating candlelit dinners to private in-villa moments.

items.title: Photo Moment on the Boat
items.excerpt: Take a picturesque short ride surrounded by verdant lotus fields in a traditional sampan. Capture stunning photos and create unforgettable memories on this one-of-a-kind experience.

items.title: Starlit Cinema: Ubud's Cozy Bohemian Movie Nights
items.excerpt: Experience the magic of cinema under the stars. Our Starlit Cinema offers a cozy bohemian setting with curated films, comfortable seating and romantic ambience.

items.title: Lunch in Color: A Cozy Escape for Two
items.excerpt: Escape to a vibrant outdoor experience, where every corner bursts with color and charm. Designed for couples who enjoy relaxed, intimate dining with a joyful atmosphere.

items.title: Sip, Savor, and Relax: A Luxurious High Tea Experience
items.excerpt: Enjoy a delightful high tea in an elegant setting, featuring handcrafted pastries and specialty teas — a refined escape amid Ubud's rice fields.

items.title: A Magical Night Under the Stars: Candlelit Floating Dinner
items.excerpt: Experience an unforgettable floating dinner set in a serene pool — candlelit tables, gentle music and an intimate atmosphere for couples.

items.title: Balinese Night Market
items.excerpt: Stroll through a vibrant night market featuring local street food, handicrafts and live entertainment — a lively cultural evening to share together.

items.title: Forest Dining
items.excerpt: Dine beneath the canopy of the jungle, surrounded by the sounds of nature — a romantic and atmospheric culinary experience.

items.title: Romantic Dinner
items.excerpt: An intimate fine-dining experience crafted for two — candlelight, curated menus and attentive service in private settings.

items.title: In-Villa Romantic Dinner
items.excerpt: Enjoy a private dining experience in the comfort of your villa, with bespoke menus and a personalised setting for couples.

items.title: Candlelight Garden Dinner
items.excerpt: A serene dinner in a garden setting illuminated by candles — perfect for memorable, romantic moments.

items.title: Vedika Candlelight Dinner
items.excerpt: A special candlelight experience inspired by local flavours and romantic ambience — ideal for anniversaries and proposals.

items.title: Sunset Barbecue Dinner by the Pool
items.excerpt: Relax by the pool and enjoy a barbecue dinner as the sun sets — casual, flavorful and perfect for couples who love laid-back evenings.

items.title: Balinese Cooking Class
items.excerpt: Learn the secrets of Balinese cuisine together in a hands-on cooking class — a fun and delicious bonding activity.

items.title: Romantic Flower Bath
items.excerpt: Indulge in a private flower bath ritual — relaxing, aromatic and beautifully presented for a luxurious couple's experience.

items.title: Kids Activities
items.excerpt: Family-friendly activities for younger guests so parents can enjoy a worry-free romantic outing while kids are entertained.

items.title: Awana Pool Daypass
items.excerpt: Relax by the pool with a day pass — enjoy facilities and a perfect day by the water.
